scripts.build: yarn format && yarn build:esm && yarn build:cjs && yarn copy-abi:uni && yarn build:types && yarn tree-shaking:lib
scripts.copy-abi:uni: cpx "artifacts/contracts/Unidirectional.sol/Unidirectional.json" lib/esm/abi/ && cpx "artifacts/contracts/Unidirectional.sol/Unidirectional.json" lib/cjs/abi/ && cpx "artifacts/contracts/Unidirectional.sol/Unidirectional.json" abi/
scripts.build:esm: npx rimraf lib/esm && npx hardhat compile && tsc --project tsconfig.esm.json
scripts.build:cjs: npx rimraf lib/cjs && npx hardhat compile && tsc --project tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.tree-shaking:lib: npx rimraf lib/cjs/hardhat.config.* && npx rimraf lib/esm/hardhat.config.* && npx rimraf lib/types/hardhat.config.* && npx rimraf lib/cjs/**/*.map && npx rimraf lib/esm/**/*.map && npx rimraf lib/types/**/*.map
scripts.deploy:local: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Unidirectional.ts --network hardhat
scripts.deploy:uni:polygon: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Unidirectional.ts --network polygon --verify
scripts.deploy:uni:hardhat: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Unidirectional.ts --network local
scripts.deploy:uni:polygonAmoy: npx rimraf ignition/deployments && npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Unidirectional.ts --network polygonAmoy
scripts.deploy:sigTest:hardhat: npx rimraf ignition/deployments && npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/SigTest.ts --network hardhat
